title: Sans Serif with Flair
content:
Under a time crunch and must ID this font. Any help would be appreciated!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Sans Serif.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164226/http:/typophile.com/files/Sans%20Serif.jpg) | 51.28 KB |
author: zhongliqiu

comments.content:
Sorry: Couldn't find the Harper or Aaron but found the ampersand:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164226im_/http:/typophile.com/files/amp_4752.jpg)

[http://www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Quicksand%20-%20Light&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=2068ad55baae423c740966c8cdf1dc69&wrap=2&text=%26ARPER%20ARON](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164226/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Quicksand%20-%20Light&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=2068ad55baae423c740966c8cdf1dc69&wrap=2&text=%26ARPER%20ARON)

"HARPER" & "AARON" look like a customized **[Quicksand (Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164226/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Google-Web-Fonts&ffam=Quicksand%20-%20Bold&fstyle=&fsize=60&fid=a1d3f9c43a9bb11db235cb6e8be77f4f&wrap=2&text=HARPER%20AARON)** by Andrew Paglinawan (2011) - part of Google Web Fonts

-----------------------------------------------  
I found it using Find my Font - [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015164226/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
